means: digital filter evaluation and simulation tool 数字滤波器评估与模拟工具

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"吸收"之意。
means: absorb ：普通用词，词义广泛，既可指吸收光、热、液体等具体东西，又可指吸收知识等抽象概念的东西。
suck ：作"吸收"解时，可与absorb换用，但还可有"吮吸"之意。
digest ：侧重在消化道内改变食物的化学结构后被人体吸收。
incorporate ：指一物或多物与它物相融合，形成一整体。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"摘要，概要，概括"之意。
means: summary ： 普通用词，指将书籍或文章等的内容，用寥寥数语作简明扼要的说明。
abstract ： 指论文、书籍等正文前的内容摘要，尤指学术论文或法律文件的研究提要。
digest ： 侧重对原文融汇贯通，重新谋篇布局，以简明扼要的语言，简短篇幅成文，展现原作精华。
outline ： 指配以释议文字的提纲。
resume ： 源于洁语，与summary极相近，通常可互换使用。

sentence.Network_en: The organization publishes a regular digest of environmental statistics.
sentence.Network_cn: 该组织定期出版一份环境统计数据摘要。

sentence.Network_en: All this has upset me. I need time to digest it all.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以这些都让我心烦。我需要时间来慢慢接受这一切。

普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... digestion 消化 digestive 消化的 dignify 使高贵.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin digest- 'distributed, dissolved, digested', from the verb digerere, from di- 'apart' + gerere 'carry'; the noun from Latin digesta 'matters methodically arranged', from digestus 'divided', from digerere

entry.def: When food digests or when you digest it, it passes through your body to your stomach. Your stomach removes the substances that your body needs and gets rid of the rest.

example.ex: Do not undertake strenuous exercise for a few hours after a meal to allow food to digest...
example.tran: 饭后几个小时不要从事剧烈运动，以便食物能够消化。

entry.def: If you digest information, you think about it carefully so that you understand it.

example.ex: They learn well but seem to need time to digest information...
example.tran: 他们学得不错，但似乎还需要一些时间来消化信息。

example.ex: She read everything, digesting every fragment of news.
example.tran: 她什么都读，新闻中的任何只言片语都要一一揣摩。

entry.tran: 慢慢接受(令人不快的消息)
entry.def: If you digest some unpleasant news, you think about it until you are able to accept it and know how to deal with it.

example.ex: All this has upset me. I need time to digest it all.
example.tran: 所以这些都让我心烦。我需要时间来慢慢接受这一切。

entry.def: A digest is a collection of pieces of writing. They are published together in a shorter  form than they were originally published.

example.ex: The organization publishes a regular digest of environmental statistics.
example.tran: 该组织定期出版一份环境统计数据摘要。

means.word_mean: 1. a periodical that summarizes the news
2. something that is compiled (as into a single book or file)
2. arrange and integrate in the mind;
3. put up with something or somebody unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks"
"She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage"

means.word_mean: 5. systematize, as by classifying and summarizing;

sentences.sentence: "the government digested the entire law into a code"

means.word_mean: 6. soften or disintegrate, as by undergoing exposure to heat or moisture

sentences.sentence: "condense the contents of a book into a summary"

means.word_mean: 8. soften or disintegrate by means of chemical action, heat, or moisture

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =two, double 表示"两个,双"; 2. 表示"使…变成,分开,离开"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有两个头的, 双头的

stems_affixes.word_buile: di两个,双+chrom颜色+atic表形容词→两色的
di两个,双+lemma论点,争论→二种争论→进退两难
di两个,双+oxide氧化物→二氧化物
di使…变成,分开,离开+lapid石头+ate表动词→[造房子的]石头分开→倒塌
di使…变成,分开,离开+gest带→分开带,只带营养→消化→经过消化后的精华→文摘
dicho=di两个,双+tom切割+ize表动词→切成二分
di两个,双+verge=vers转→两个转弯的地方→分岔;分歧
di使…变成,分开,离开+gress走→走开→离题
di使…变成,分开,离开+lapid石头+ate表动词→[造房子的]石头分开→倒塌
di使…变成,分开,离开+late放→分开放→扩大
di使…变成,分开,离开+lut冲洗+e→冲洗开→冲淡
di使…变成,分开,离开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少
di使…变成,分开,离开+vid分开+e→分开
di使…变成,分开,离开+vorce=vert转→从[丈夫身边]转开→离婚;参考:divert转开

means.word_mean: 透彻了解,领会；领悟；理解

sentences.en: It often takes a long time to digest new ideas.
sentences.cn: 吸收新思想往往需要很长一段时间。

sentences.en: You should digest what he said.
sentences.cn: 你应该仔细体会他说的话。

means.word_mean: 摘要, 文摘, 汇编

sentences.en: I read only this digest of the novel.
sentences.cn: 我只读过该小说的摘要。

jushi.chinese: 他吃的食物还没有消化完。
